StoryElement.StoryElement: Holy crap that was close. Oh, that must be the men’s bath! Here we go.
[Robby enters the men’s locker area.]
Good, no one here either.
AI: Excuse me! Oh, there you are.
[Robby turns to see Ai enter the locker room wearing nothing but a towel.]
ROBBY: Ai, what are you doing? This is the men’s bath.
AI: Looks like we’re both still a little drunk. I just saw you run out of the women’s bath.
ROBBY: That must have been another foreigner wearing a bathing suit. Look, you should get out of here before someone . . .
AI: No one’s here yet. Let’s go in together real quick.

StoryInteraction.StoryInteraction: Are you crazy? You know what they’d do to me if they found out?

StoryResponse.StoryResponse: ROBBY: I don’t know either, but I read how they tortured GIs during World War 2 and . . .

StoryElement.StoryElement: [An old man enters with a young woman. The four stare at each other.]
OLD MAN: Hey, you’re not allowed to bring a girl in here! What do you think this is Thailand?
ROBBY: Excuse me!
[Robby bolts out of the locker room and runs down the hall.]
Gotta get out of here! Oh there’s a green sign with a man escaping. I’ll follow him!
[Robby pushes the exit door open into the balmy night air.]

I’m just gonna run until I reach the nearest harbor. Hop on a ship or . . . screw it! I’ll swim! I’ll swim to Thailand! No, stop thinking about Thailand. How do I get out of this picturesque Japanese garden? Oh wow, bonsai! Ow!
[Robby wacks his head on a low hanging branch. Robby point of view changes so that he’s looking up straight up at the stars. His focus goes in and out.]
Oh my head!
[A figure stands over him. It’s a woman but she’s not in focus yet.]
MARIKO: Robby?
ROBBY: Mariko? I was looking for . . . the pool.
[Robby’s consciousness fades and he blacks out.]
